description: This file defines an abstract generic class BaseMapper used for converting between entity objects and Data Transfer Objects (DTOs), providing common conversion methods for collections of entities and DTOs.

classes.name: BaseMapper
classes.description: A generic abstract class for mapping between entity objects and DTOs, with methods for converting singular objects and collections.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Abstract method to convert a DTO to an entity, to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Abstract method to convert an entity to a DTO, to be implemented by subclasses.

methods.name: convertToEntity
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a collection of entities.

methods.name: convertToDto
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a collection of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntityList
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a list of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoList
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a list of DTOs.

methods.name: convertToEntitySet
methods.description: Converts a collection of DTOs into a set of entities.

methods.name: convertToDtoSet
methods.description: Converts a collection of entities into a set of DTOs.
